name: Outrun (itch) (skadi030)
description:
Local sofa game:

Catcher (red capsule) catch Runner (black capsule)

Runner (black capsule) runs away from Catcher (red capsule)

Catcher:

Control - WASD (movement), shift (dash)

If Catcher hit the wall, he will be stunned for 3 seconds

Runner:

Control -  Up, down, left, right arrow keys (movement)

Rules:

1. If Catcher can catch Runner within time limit. Catcher win.

2. If time expires, Runner win.
